trans-unit.source: The SMTP service must be activated. See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> for more details.

seg-source.mrk: The SMTP service must be activated.
See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> for more details.

target.mrk: Le service SMTP doit être activé.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

alt-trans.seg-source: To add email addresses that will receive notifications, you must have set the <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">SMTP service. See Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> for more details.
alt-trans.target: Pour ajouter des adresses e-mail qui recevront des notifications, vous devez avoir défini le <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">SMTP service. See Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

See Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

See Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: To enable specific recipients to receive notifications:

seg-source.mrk: To enable specific recipients to receive notifications:

target.mrk: Pour permettre à des destinataires spécifiques de recevoir des notifications :

trans-unit.source: Open the <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Open the <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Ouvrez la <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Select Notifications in the lateral menu to open the list of notifications.

seg-source.mrk: Select Notifications in the lateral menu to open the list of notifications.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Notifications dans le menu latéral pour ouvrir la liste des notifications.

trans-unit.source: You can also click the Notifications tile in the dashboard of the .

seg-source.mrk: You can also click the Notifications tile in the dashboard of the .

target.mrk: Vous pouvez également cliquer sur la tuile Notifications dans le tableau de bord de la .

trans-unit.source: In the upper-left corner, click the cogwheel button above the list of notifications, then click the Sending tab. The recipients configuration window appears (see Figure).

seg-source.mrk: In the upper-left corner, click the cogwheel button above the list of notifications, then click the Sending tab.

The recipients configuration window appears<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="General.Hidden" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> (<MadCap:xref href="#recipients_config" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

target.mrk: Dans le coin supérieur gauche, cliquez sur le bouton en forme de roue dentée au-dessus de la liste des notifications, puis cliquez sur l'onglet Envoi.

La fenêtre de configuration des destinataires apparaît<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="General.Hidden" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> (<MadCap:xref href="#recipients_config" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

trans-unit.source: Options to configure notifications and recipients

seg-source.mrk: Options to configure notifications and recipients

target.mrk: Options pour configurer les notifications et les destinataires

trans-unit.source: Add recipients. To add a recipient, enter an email address, then click the + button.

seg-source.mrk: To add a recipient, enter an email address, then click the + button.

target.mrk: Pour ajouter un destinataire, entrez une adresse e-mail, puis cliquez sur le bouton +.

trans-unit.source: Allow e-mail notifications: Send notifications that have not yet been acknowledged.

seg-source.mrk: Allow e-mail notifications: Send notifications that have not yet been acknowledged.

target.mrk: Autoriser les notifications par e-mail : Envoyez des notifications qui n'ont pas encore été acquittées.

trans-unit.source: Send e-mail only at error level: Enable only alarm notifications.

seg-source.mrk: Send e-mail only at error level: Enable only alarm notifications.

target.mrk: Envoyer un e-mail uniquement au niveau d'erreur : Activez uniquement les notifications d'alarme.

trans-unit.source: Notification hour: Set a time for notification dispatch.

seg-source.mrk: Notification hour: Set a time for notification dispatch.

target.mrk: Heure de notification : Définissez une heure pour l'envoi de la notification.

trans-unit.source: Click Save to return to the Notifications interface.

seg-source.mrk: Click Save to return to the Notifications interface.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Enregistrer pour revenir à l'interface Notifications.
